author: Pete L.

review: So convenient, I typically use my game system to use apps but with the stick its much simpler. 2 things that are a concern are the remote which is very small and easy to misplace/use. There is an App for smartphones that lets you use you're phone as a remote but it's not as easy to use as the remote and gets some getting used to.  2nd is that I would not recommend keeping the firestick plugged in all the time. It requires to be plugged into a power source to be in use and it gets pretty hot for such a small device. I always unplug it after use, but it's very inconvenient for daily use. Heat kills electronics so if you let it stay plugged as you would any other TV piece it will slow down over time or break sooner than expected.
